@@ init

@@OV08D_MIPI_3264x2448_2lane_1440M_30fps_V2.1
;improved small signal linearity and Hbanding
100 99 3264 2448

;Tline = 12.77777778 us

;Mipibitrate 1440Mbps/lane  2lane
;fps 30.008
;pclk = 36M(35999997)
;dt= 0x2b 10bit
;hts 0x1cc
;vts 0xA30  vts = 2504 + P1:[0x05:0x06](hex2dec)/2 ;The VTS must be integer multiples of 4
;Max Exp VTS-20
;Min Exp 4 line
;Suggest maxinum exposure time is 1 second if you want to achieve greater exposure time
;analog gain 15.5x
;digital gain (1x-32x)
;OB 0x40


20 fd 00
20 20 0e
sl 33 ; sleep time

20 20 0b
20 fd 00
20 10 05
20 11 2a
20 12 03
20 13 05
20 14 43
20 15 02
20 16 82

20 18 78

20 1d 13
20 1e 23
20 1f 0f
20 20 0f

20 1a 14
20 1b 10
20 2a 03
20 2b 34

@@OV08D_MIPI_3264x2448_2lane_1440M_24fps_V2.1
;improved small signal linearity and Hbanding
100 99 3264 2448

;Tline = 12.77777778 us
;Mipibitrate 1440Mbps/lane  2lane
;fps 24.15
;pclk = 36M(35999997)
;dt= 0x2b 10bit
;hts 0x1cc
;vts 0xCA8  vts = 2504 + P1:[0x05:0x06](hex2dec)/2 ;The VTS must be integer multiples of 4
;Max Exp VTS-20
;Min Exp 4 line
;Suggest maxinum exposure time is 1 second if you want to achieve greater exposure time
;analog gain 15.5x
;digital gain (1x-32x)
;OB 0x40

@@OV08D_MIPI_3264x1840_2lane_1440M_30fps_V2.1
;improved small signal linearity and Hbanding
100 99 3264 1840

;Tline = 12.77777778 us
;Mipibitrate 1440Mbps/lane  2lane
;fps 30.008
;pclk = 36M(35999997)
;dt= 0x2b 10bit
;hts 0x1cc
;vts 0xA30  vts = 2504 + P1:[0x05:0x06](hex2dec)/2 ;The VTS must be integer multiples of 4

;Min Exp 4 line
;Suggest maxinum exposure time is 1 second if you want to achieve greater exposure time
;analog gain 15.5x
;digital gain (1x-32x)
;OB 0x40

@@OV08D_MIPI_1632x1224_2lane_720M_24fps_V2.0

100 99 1632 1224
102 80 1
102 81 0

;bg/br
;Tline = 13.27777778 us
;Mipibitrate 720Mbps/lane  2lane
;fps 24.046
;pclk = 36M(35999997)
;dt= 0x2b 10bit
;hts 0x1de
;vts 0xc3c  vts = 1252 + P1:[0x05:0x06](hex2dec)/2 ;The VTS must be integer multiples of 4
;Max Exp VTS-20
;Min Exp 4 line
;Suggest maxinum exposure time is 1 second if you want to achieve greater exposure time
;analog gain 15.5x
;digital gain (1x-32x)
;OB 0x40

20 fd 00
20 20 0e
sl 33 ; sleep time

20 20 0b
20 fd 00
20 10 05
20 11 2a
20 12 03
20 13 05
20 14 43 ;dpll 402M
20 15 02
20 16 82
20 17 05
20 18 3c
20 19 04
20 1a 05
20 1b f0
20 1c 19 ;mpllout 720M
20 1d 00
20 1e 23 ;row clk equal to timer_clk/2
20 1f 0f
20 20 0f
20 21 00

20 fd 01
20 1a 0a
20 1b 08
20 2a 01 ;col_ana_addr_size_4msb :binning must set
20 2b 9a ;col_ana_addr_size_8lsb :binning must set

20 fd 01
20 12 00 ;bit0=1 colorbar en
20 03 05
20 04 08
20 05 0e
20 06 b0
20 07 05
20 21 02
20 24 ff
20 31 06
20 33 03
20 01 03
20 19 10 ;n2p offset 64
20 42 55 ;rst_clamp on , sig_clamp on
20 43 00
20 47 07
20 48 08
20 4c 38
20 b2 7e ;1st comp
20 b3 7b
20 bd 08 
20 d2 47 ;1st cap 1
20 d3 10 ;ramp offset x1 1.1
20 d4 0d ;ramp offset x2 0.95
20 d5 08 ;ramp offset x4 0.75
20 d6 07 ;ramp offset x8 0.7

20 b1 00
20 b4 00
20 b5 07
20 b6 07
20 b7 0a ;vh 3.5v
20 bc 44
20 bf 42 ;range 747mv
20 c1 10
20 c3 24
20 c8 03 ;vlow en
20 c6 e0
20 c7 30
20 c9 f8
20 e1 33 ;1x to 2x vlow 1.0v
20 e2 bb ;2x to 16x vrfd_low AVDD

20 51 0c ;timing
20 52 0a ;timing
20 57 8c ;timing
20 59 09 ;timing
20 5a 08 ;timing
20 5e 10 ;timing
20 60 02 ;timing
20 6d 5c ;timing
20 76 16 ;timing
20 7c 1a ;timing
20 90 28 ;timing
20 91 16 ;timing
20 92 1c ;timing 
20 93 24 ;timing
20 95 48 ;timing
20 9c 06 ; col_boost_rst width
20 ca 0c
20 ce 0d

20 fd 01 ;psr tuning
20 c0 00 ;bit2 = 0 psnc en
20 dd 18 ;1x
20 de 19 ;1.5x
20 df 32 ;2x
20 e0 70 ;4x

20 fd 01 ;bsun tuning
20 c2 05 ;rst clamp dn en 
20 d7 88
20 d8 77
20 d9 66

20 fd 07 ;blc tuning
20 00 f8 ;blc trigger en 
20 01 2b ;blc on
20 05 40
20 08 03 ;black row start
20 09 08 ;black row end
20 28 6f
20 2a 20
20 2b 05
20 2c 01 ;r_thres_man high 4bit
20 50 02 ;zero row start
20 51 03 ;zero row end
20 5e 10 ;dither enable gain 4x
20 52 00;k
20 53 80
20 54 00
20 55 80
20 56 00
20 57 80
20 58 00
20 59 80
20 5c 3f

20 fd 02 
20 9a 00 ;dpc off,if enable (set 0xf0) , row_num - 2
20 a8 02;

20 fd 02 ;cropping size
20 a9 04;vsize_dpc[11:8]
20 aa d0;vsize_dpc[7:0]
20 ab 06;hsize_dpc[11:8]
20 ac 68;hsize_dpc[7:0]

20 a0 00
20 a1 04
20 a2 04 ;dem_v_size_4msb
20 a3 c8 ;dem_v_size_8lsb
20 a4 00
20 a5 04
20 a6 06 ;dem_h_size_4msb
20 a7 60 ;dem_h_size_8lsb
;For Bin size OTP_DPC mirror off/flip off
20 fd 05
20 04 60
20 06 80
20 07 99
20 0D 03
20 0F 03
20 10 00
20 11 00
20 12 0C
20 13 CF
20 14 00
20 15 00
20 18 06
20 19 68




20 fd 00
20 24 01 ;mipi clk inv en
20 c0 16
20 c1 08
20 c2 30
20 8e 06 ;mipi hsize msb
20 8f 60 ;mipi hsize lsb,  3264
20 90 04 ;mipi vsize msb
20 91 c8 ;mipi vsize lsb,  2448
20 93 0e
20 94 77
20 95 77
20 96 10
20 98 88
20 9c 1a
20 b7 02



20 fd 00 ;must locate this group reg. at the end
20 20 0f ;soft reset
20 e7 03
20 e7 00
20 fd 01





@@OV08D_MIPI_2560x1920_2lane_1440M_24fps_V2.1

;Tline = 12.77777778 us
;Mipibitrate 1440Mbps/lane  2lane
;fps 24.035
;pclk = 36M(35999997)
;dt= 0x2b 10bit
;hts 0x1cc
;vts 0xCB8  vts = 2504 + P1:[0x05:0x06](hex2dec)/2 ;The VTS must be integer multiples of 4
;Max Exp VTS-20
;Min Exp 4 line
;Suggest maxinum exposure time is 1 second if you want to achieve greater exposure time
;analog gain 15.5x
;digital gain (1x-32x)
;OB 0x40


100 99 2560 1920
102 80 1
102 81 0

20 fd 00
20 20 0e
sl 33 ; sleep time


20 20 0b
20 fd 00
20 10 05
20 11 2a
20 12 03
20 13 05
20 14 43 ;dpll 402M
20 15 02
20 16 82 ;pll3 enable
20 17 05 
20 18 78
20 19 04
20 1a 05
20 1b f0
20 1c 09
20 1d 13
20 1e 23 ;pclk= pll3_pclk, row clk= timer_clk/2= 36M
20 1f 0f
20 20 0f
20 21 00

20 fd 01
20 1a 04
20 1b 10
20 2a 03
20 2b 34

20 fd 01
20 12 00 ;bit0=1 colorbar en
20 05 05
20 06 e0
20 03 05
20 04 08
20 07 05
20 21 02
20 24 10
20 33 03
20 33 03
20 01 03
20 19 10 ;n2p offset 64
20 42 5d;55 ;rst_clamp on , sig_clamp on
20 43 00
20 47 07
20 48 08
20 4c 38 ;[5]=1 with pulse in dummy rst row
20 b2 7e ;1st comp
20 b3 78;7b
20 bd 08 
20 d2 47 ;1st cap 1
20 d3 10 ;ramp offset x1 1.1
20 d4 0d ;ramp offset x2 0.95
20 d5 08 ;ramp offset x4 0.75
20 d6 07 ;ramp offset x8 0.7

20 b1 00
20 b4 00
20 b5 01
20 b6 01
20 b7 01;0a ;vh 3.5v
20 bc 44
20 bf 42 ;range 747mv
20 c1 10 ;vref2 ds 2x
20 c3 24
20 c8 03 ;vlow en
20 c6 f0;
20 c7 30
20 c9 c8;f8
20 e1 33 ;1x to 2x vlow 1.0v
20 e2 bb ;2x to 16x vrfd_low AVDD

20 51 0c ;timing
20 52 0a ;timing
20 57 8c ;timing
20 59 09 ;timing
20 5a 08 ;timing
20 5e 10 ;timing
20 60 02 ;timing
20 6d 5c ;timing
20 76 16 ;timing
20 7c 11 ;timing
20 90 28 ;timing
20 91 16 ;timing
20 92 1c ;timing 
20 93 24 ;timing
20 95 48 ;timing
20 9c 06 ; col_boost_rst width
20 ca 0c
20 ce 0d

20 fd 01 ;psr tuning
20 c0 00 ;bit2 = 0 psnc en
20 dd 18 ;1x
20 de 19 ;1.5x
20 df 32 ;2x
20 e0 70 ;4x

20 fd 01 ;bsun tuning
20 c2 05 ;rst clamp dn en 
20 d7 88
20 d8 77
20 d9 66

20 fd 07 ;blc tuning
20 00 f8 ;blc trigger en 
20 01 2b ;blc on
20 05 40
20 08 06 ;black row start
20 09 11 ;black row end
20 28 6f
20 2a 20
20 2b 05
20 2c 00
20 50 04
20 51 07
20 5e 10 ;dither enable gain 4x
20 52 00;k
20 53 80
20 54 00
20 55 80
20 56 00
20 57 80
20 58 00
20 59 80
20 5c 3f

20 fd 02 
20 9a f0;00 ;dpc off
20 a8 02 ;for dpc bayer pattern mismatch

20 fd 02 ;cropping size
20 a9 09
20 aa a0
20 ab 0c
20 ac d0

20 a0 01
20 a1 10
20 a2 07
20 a3 80
20 a4 01
20 a5 68
20 a6 0a ;dem_h_size_4msb
20 a7 00 ;dem_h_size_8lsb
;For Full size OTP_DPC mirror off/flip off
20 fd 05
20 04 40
20 06 00
20 07 00
20 0D 01
20 0F 01
20 10 00
20 11 00
20 12 0C
20 13 CF
20 14 00
20 15 00
20 18 00
20 19 00



                                                                
20 fd 00
20 24 01 ;mipi clk inv en
20 c0 16
20 c1 08
20 c2 30
20 8e 0a ;mipi hsize msb
20 8f 00 ;mipi hsize lsb,  3264
20 90 07 ;mipi vsize msb
20 91 80 ;mipi vsize lsb,  2448
20 93 14
20 94 cc
20 95 ba
20 96 16
20 98 ee
20 9c 32
20 b7 02

20 20 0f ;soft reset

20 fd 01




@@OV08D_MIPI_2304x1728_2lane_1440M_24fps_V2.1

;Tline = 12.77777778 us
;Mipibitrate 1440Mbps/lane  2lane
;fps 24.035
;pclk = 36M(35999997)
;dt= 0x2b 10bit
;hts 0x1cc
;vts 0xCB8  vts = 2504 + P1:[0x05:0x06](hex2dec)/2 ;The VTS must be integer multiples of 4
;Max Exp VTS-20
;Min Exp 4 line
;Suggest maxinum exposure time is 1 second if you want to achieve greater exposure time
;analog gain 15.5x
;digital gain (1x-32x)
;OB 0x40


100 99 2304 1728
102 80 1
102 81 0

20 fd 00
20 20 0e
sl 33 ; sleep time

20 20 0b
20 fd 00
20 10 05
20 11 2a
20 12 03
20 13 05
20 14 43 ;dpll 402M
20 15 02
20 16 82 ;pll3 enable
20 17 05 
20 18 78
20 19 04
20 1a 05
20 1b f0
20 1c 09
20 1d 13
20 1e 23 ;pclk= pll3_pclk, row clk= timer_clk/2= 36M
20 1f 0f
20 20 0f
20 21 00

20 fd 01
20 1a 04
20 1b 10
20 2a 03
20 2b 34

20 fd 01
20 12 00 ;bit0=1 colorbar en
20 05 05
20 06 e0
20 03 05
20 04 08
20 07 05
20 21 02
20 24 10
20 33 03
20 33 03
20 01 03
20 19 10 ;n2p offset 64
20 42 5d;55 ;rst_clamp on , sig_clamp on
20 43 00
20 47 07
20 48 08
20 4c 38 ;[5]=1 with pulse in dummy rst row
20 b2 7e ;1st comp
20 b3 78;7b
20 bd 08 
20 d2 47 ;1st cap 1
20 d3 10 ;ramp offset x1 1.1
20 d4 0d ;ramp offset x2 0.95
20 d5 08 ;ramp offset x4 0.75
20 d6 07 ;ramp offset x8 0.7

20 b1 00
20 b4 00
20 b5 01
20 b6 01
20 b7 01;0a ;vh 3.5v
20 bc 44
20 bf 42 ;range 747mv
20 c1 10 ;vref2 ds 2x
20 c3 24
20 c8 03 ;vlow en
20 c6 f0;
20 c7 30
20 c9 c8;f8
20 e1 33 ;1x to 2x vlow 1.0v
20 e2 bb ;2x to 16x vrfd_low AVDD

20 51 0c ;timing
20 52 0a ;timing
20 57 8c ;timing
20 59 09 ;timing
20 5a 08 ;timing
20 5e 10 ;timing
20 60 02 ;timing
20 6d 5c ;timing
20 76 16 ;timing
20 7c 11 ;timing
20 90 28 ;timing
20 91 16 ;timing
20 92 1c ;timing 
20 93 24 ;timing
20 95 48 ;timing
20 9c 06 ; col_boost_rst width
20 ca 0c
20 ce 0d

20 fd 01 ;psr tuning
20 c0 00 ;bit2 = 0 psnc en
20 dd 18 ;1x
20 de 19 ;1.5x
20 df 32 ;2x
20 e0 70 ;4x

20 fd 01 ;bsun tuning
20 c2 05 ;rst clamp dn en 
20 d7 88
20 d8 77
20 d9 66

20 fd 07 ;blc tuning
20 00 f8 ;blc trigger en 
20 01 2b ;blc on
20 05 40
20 08 06 ;black row start
20 09 11 ;black row end
20 28 6f
20 2a 20
20 2b 05
20 2c 00
20 50 04
20 51 07
20 5e 10 ;dither enable gain 4x
20 52 00;k
20 53 80
20 54 00
20 55 80
20 56 00
20 57 80
20 58 00
20 59 80
20 5c 3f

20 fd 02 
20 9a f0;00 ;dpc off
20 a8 02 ;for dpc bayer pattern mismatch

20 fd 02 ;cropping size
20 a9 09
20 aa a0
20 ab 0c
20 ac d0

20 a0 01
20 a1 70
20 a2 06
20 a3 c0
20 a4 01
20 a5 e8
20 a6 09 ;dem_h_size_4msb
20 a7 00 ;dem_h_size_8lsb
;For Full size OTP_DPC mirror off/flip off
20 fd 05
20 04 40
20 06 00
20 07 00
20 0D 01
20 0F 01
20 10 00
20 11 00
20 12 0C
20 13 CF
20 14 00
20 15 00
20 18 00
20 19 00




20 fd 00
20 24 01 ;mipi clk inv en
20 c0 16
20 c1 08
20 c2 30
20 8e 09 ;mipi hsize msb
20 8f 00 ;mipi hsize lsb,  3264
20 90 06 ;mipi vsize msb
20 91 c0 ;mipi vsize lsb,  2448
20 93 14
20 94 cc
20 95 ba
20 96 16
20 98 ee
20 9c 32
20 b7 02



20 fd 00 ;must locate this group reg. at the end
20 20 0f ;soft reset
20 e7 03
20 e7 00
20 fd 01




@@OV08D_MIPI_1624x1248_2lane_1440M_24fps_V2.1

;Tline = 12.77777778 us
;Mipibitrate 1440Mbps/lane  2lane
;fps 24.035
;pclk = 36M(35999997)
;dt= 0x2b 10bit
;hts 0x1cc
;vts 0xCB8  vts = 2504 + P1:[0x05:0x06](hex2dec)/2 ;The VTS must be integer multiples of 4
;Max Exp VTS-20
;Min Exp 4 line
;Suggest maxinum exposure time is 1 second if you want to achieve greater exposure time
;analog gain 15.5x
;digital gain (1x-32x)
;OB 0x40

100 99 1664 1248
102 80 1
102 81 0

20 fd 00
20 20 0e
sl 33 ; sleep time


20 20 0b
20 fd 00
20 10 05
20 11 2a
20 12 03
20 13 05
20 14 43 ;dpll 402M
20 15 02
20 16 82 ;pll3 enable
20 17 05 
20 18 78
20 19 04
20 1a 05
20 1b f0
20 1c 09
20 1d 13
20 1e 23 ;pclk= pll3_pclk, row clk= timer_clk/2= 36M

20 20 0f
20 21 00

20 1a 04
20 1b 10
20 2a 03
20 2b 34

20 03 05

20 42 5d;55 ;rst_clamp on , sig_clamp on

20 d3 10 ;ramp offset x1 1.1
20 d4 0d ;ramp offset x2 0.95
20 d5 08 ;ramp offset x4 0.75
20 d6 07 ;ramp offset x8 0.7

20 b4 00

@@mipi stream on
20 fd 00
20 a0 01
@@mipi stream off
20 fd 00
20 a0 00
